*****CARD IS SOLD*****

Picked up recently in hopes of snagging a few Hindu's for the collection, but I just don't have the passion for backs so Mr. Reulbach need's to go to a new home. Originates from a recent Texas find by a member here which included a plethora of Hindu's. Great color on this one. $435 delivered. Paypal A-Okay with no added fee. Drop me an email if you like em'. 
Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/ruelbachhindufront-2.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/ruelbachhinduback.jpg[/IMG]
Card is sold. Thanks all, Tony
